title: ICE: find_associated_type_in_generics(): no self type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
``` rust
#![feature(associated_types)]

trait Foo {
    type Item;
}

struct X;

impl Foo for X {
    type Item = bool;
}

fn print_x(_: &Foo, extra: &str) {
    println!("{}", extra);
}

fn main() {
    print_x(X);
}
```

Dies with 

```
test.rs:13:16: 13:19 error: internal compiler error: find_associated_type_in_generics(): no self type
test.rs:13 fn print_x(_: &Foo, extra: &str) {
                          ^~~
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
```
